PATREON_SPONSOR.description: Menu item that appears in the main menu

PATREON_SPONSOR_TITLE.message: Please sponsor the Wyliodrin STUDIO project
PATREON_SPONSOR_TITLE.description: Title text to ask users to sponsor Wyliodrin STUDIO

PATREON_SPONSOR_TEXT.message: Wyliodrin STUDIO is a free and open source project. You sponsorship allows us to maintain the project and offer it for free. Thank you.
PATREON_SPONSOR_TEXT.description: Text to ask users to sponsor Wyliodrin STUDIO

PATREON_SPONSOR_NOW.description: Button to click and go to the sponsor link

PATREON_SPONSOR_LATER.description: Button to click and sponsor later
